oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Proceedings of the Workshop on Modeling Wheat Response to High Temperature; El Batan, Texcoco, Mexico; 19-21 Jun 2013
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alderman, P.D.
Quilligan, E.
Asseng, S.
Ewert, F.
Reynolds, M.P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wheat
Plant breeding
Breeding methods
Selection
Photosystems
Yield
Grain
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The abstracts here in are of presentations by experts participating in the workshop “Modeling Wheat Response to High Temperature”. Sponsored by the CGIAR Research Program on Climate Change, Agriculture and Food Security (CCAFS) and in collaboration with the University of Florida, University of Bonn, and the Agricultural Model Intercomparison and Improvement Project (AgMIP).
